englishTranslationText:
Then	the	Spectacle	became	closer,	and	
(he)	came	down	fully.
romanUrduTranslationText: Phir	woh	jalwa	nazdeek	huwa

englishTranslationText:
So	the	distance	between	the	Spectacle	and	
the	beloved	was	only	two	arms’	length,	or	
even	less.	(The Heavenly Journey of 
Prophet Muhammad – peace and 
blessings be upon him – was with body 
and soul.)
romanUrduTranslationText:
Phir	khoob	utar	āaya	to	us	jalwe	aur	us	
Mehboob	meiñ	do	hāth	ka	fāsla	raha	
balke	is	se	bhi	kam

englishTranslationText:
So	Allah	divinely	revealed	to	His	
bondman,	whatever	He	divinely	revealed.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Ab	waḥi	farmayi	apne	bande	ko	jo	waḥi	
farmayi

englishTranslationText:
The	heart	did	not	deny,	what	it	saw.	(The Holy Prophet was bestowed with seeing Allah – see 
also preceding verses 8,9, 10 .)
romanUrduTranslationText: Dil	ne	jhoot	na	kahā	jo	dekha

englishTranslationText: What!	So	do	you	dispute	with	him	regarding	what	he	saw?
romanUrduTranslationText:
To	kya	tum	un	se	unke	dekhe	huwe	par	
jhagadte	ho

englishTranslationText: And	indeed	he	did	see	the	Spectacle	again.
romanUrduTranslationText: Aur	unhoñ	ne	to	woh	jalwa	dobār	dekha

englishTranslationText: Near	the	lote-tree	of	the	last	boundary.
romanUrduTranslationText: Sidra-tul	Muntaha	ke	pās

englishTranslationText: Close	to	which	is	the	Everlasting	Paradise.
romanUrduTranslationText: Uske	pās	Jannatul	Māva	hai

englishTranslationText: When	the	lote-tree	was	being	enveloped,	by	whatever	around	it.
romanUrduTranslationText: Jab	Sidra	par	chha	raha	tha	jo	chha	raha	tha

englishTranslationText: The	sight	did	not	shift,	nor	did	it	cross	the	limits.
romanUrduTranslationText: Āankh	na	kisi	taraf	phiri	na	had	se	badhi

arabicText: لَقَدْ رَأَىٰ مِنْ ءَايَـٰتِ رَبِّهِ ٱلْكُبْرَىٰٓ
englishTranslationText: Indeed	he	saw	the	supreme	signs	of	his	Lord.
romanUrduTranslationText: Be-shak	apne	Rab	ki	bahut	badi	nishāniyāñ	dekhiñ

englishTranslationText: So	did	you	observe	the	idols	Lat	and	Uzza?
romanUrduTranslationText: To	kya	tum	ne	dekha	Lāt	aur	Uzza

englishTranslationText: And	subsequently	the	third,	the	Manat?
romanUrduTranslationText: Aur	us	teesri	manāt	ko

englishTranslationText: What!	For	you	the	son,	and	for	Him	the	daughter?
romanUrduTranslationText: Kya	tum	ko	beta	aur	usko	beti

englishTranslationText: Then	that	is	surely	a	very	unjust	distribution!
romanUrduTranslationText: Jab	to	yeh	sakht	bhoñdi	(Buri)	taqseem	hai

arabicText: إِنْ هِىَ إِلَّآ أَسْمَآءٌۭ سَمَّيْتُمُوهَآ أَنتُمْ وَءَابَآؤُكُم مَّآ أَنزَلَ ٱللَّهُ بِهَا مِن سُلْطَـٰنٍ ۚ إِن يَتَّبِعُونَ إِلَّا ٱلظَّنَّ وَمَا تَهْوَى ٱلْأَنفُسُ ۖ وَلَقَدْ جَآءَهُم مِّن رَّبِّهِمُ ٱلْهُدَىٰٓ
englishTranslationText:
They	are	nothing	but	some	names	that	you	have	coined,	you	and	your	forefathers	-	Allah	has	
not	sent	any	proof	for	them;	they	follow	only	guesses	and	their	own	desires;	whereas	the	
guidance	from	their	Lord	has	come	to	them.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Woh	to	nahi	magar	kuchh	nām	ke	tum	ne	aur	tumhāre	bāp	dāda	ne	rakh	liye	haiñ	Allah	ne	unki	
koi	sanad	nahi	utāri	woh	to	nire	gumān	aur	nafs	ki	khwahishoñ	ke	peechhe	haiñ	halāñke	be
shak		unke	pās	unke	Rab	ki	taraf	se	hidāyat	āayi

englishTranslationText: What!	Will	man	get	whatever	he	dreams	of?
romanUrduTranslationText: Kya	ādmi	ko	mil	jāyega	jo	kuch	woh	khayāl	bāndhe

englishTranslationText: So	(know	that)	Allah	only	is	the	Owner	of	all	-	the	Hereafter	and	this	world.
romanUrduTranslationText: To	ākhirat	aur	dunya	sab	ka	Mālik	Allah	hi	hai

arabicText: ۞ وَكَم مِّن مَّلَكٍۢ فِى ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ لَا تُغْنِى شَفَـٰعَتُهُمْ شَيْـًٔا إِلَّا مِنۢ بَعْدِ أَن يَأْذَنَ ٱللَّهُ لِمَن يَشَآءُ وَيَرْضَىٰٓ
englishTranslationText:
And	many	an	angel	is	in	the	heavens,	whose	intercession	does	not	benefit	the	least	unless	Allah	
gives	permission	for	whomever	He	wills,	and	whom	He	likes.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	kitne	hi	firishte	haiñ	āsmānoñ	meiñ	ke	unki	sifarish	kuchh	kām	nahi	āti	magar	jabke	Allah	
ijazat	de	de	jiske	liye	chāhe	aur	pasand	farmaye.

arabicText: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ بِٱلْـَٔاخِرَةِ لَيُسَمُّونَ ٱلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةَ تَسْمِيَةَ ٱلْأُنثَىٰ
englishTranslationText:
Indeed	those	who	do	not	believe	in	the	
Hereafter,	coin	the	names	of	angels	like	
those	of	females.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Be-shak	woh	jo	āakhirat	par	Imān	nahi	
rakhte	haiñ	malāika	ka	nām	aurtoñ	ka	sa	
rakhte	haiñ

arabicText: وَمَا لَهُم بِهِۦ مِنْ عِلْمٍ ۖ إِن يَتَّبِعُونَ إِلَّا ٱلظَّنَّ ۖ وَإِنَّ ٱلظَّنَّ لَا يُغْنِى مِنَ ٱلْحَقِّ شَيْـًۭٔا
englishTranslationText:
And	they	do	not	have	any	knowledge	of	it;	
they	just	follow	assumption;	and	indeed	
assumption	does	not	serve	any	purpose	in	
place	of	the	Truth.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	unheiñ	iski	kuchh	khabar	nahi	woh	to	
nire	gumān	ke	peechhe	haiñ	aur	be-shak		
gumān	yaqeen	ki	jagah	kuchh	kām	nahi	
deta

arabicText: فَأَعْرِضْ عَن مَّن تَوَلَّىٰ عَن ذِكْرِنَا وَلَمْ يُرِدْ إِلَّا ٱلْحَيَوٰةَ ٱلدُّنْيَا
englishTranslationText:
Therefore	turn	away	from	whoever	has	
turned	away	from	Our	remembrance	and	
has	desired	only	the	life	of	this	world.
romanUrduTranslationText:
To	tum	us	se	moñh	pher	lo	jo	hamāri	yād	
se	phira	aur	us	ne	na	chāhi	magar	dunya	
ki	zindagi

arabicText: ذَٰلِكَ مَبْلَغُهُم مِّنَ ٱلْعِلْمِ ۚ إِنَّ رَبَّكَ هُوَ أَعْلَمُ بِمَن ضَلَّ عَن سَبِيلِهِۦ وَهُوَ أَعْلَمُ بِمَنِ ٱهْتَدَىٰ
englishTranslationText:
This	is	the	extent	of	their	knowledge;	
indeed	your	Lord	well	knows	one	who	has	
strayed	from	His	path,	and	He	well	knows	
one	who	has	attained	guidance.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Yahāñ	tak	unke	ilm	ki	pahuñch	hai	be
shak		tumhāra	Rab	khoob	jānta	hai	jo	uski	
rāh	se	behka	aur	woh	khoob	jānta	hai	
jisne	rāh	pāyi.

arabicText: وَلِلَّهِ مَا فِى ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَمَا فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ لِيَجْزِىَ ٱلَّذِينَ أَسَـٰٓـُٔوا۟ بِمَا عَمِلُوا۟ وَيَجْزِىَ ٱلَّذِينَ أَحْسَنُوا۟ بِٱلْحُسْنَى
englishTranslationText:
And	to	Allah	only	belongs	all	whatever	is	
in	the	heavens	and	all	whatever	is	in	the	
earth,	in	order	to	repay	those	who	do	evil	
for	what	they	have	done,	and	give	an	
excellent	reward	to	those	who	do	good.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	Allah	hi	ka	hai	jo	kuch	āasmānoñ	
meiñ	hai	aur	jo	kuchh	zameen	meiñ	tāke	
burāi	karne	waloñ		ko	unke	kiye	ka	badla	
de	aur	neki	karne	waloñ	ko	nihayat	
achcha	sila	‘aṭa	farmaye.

arabicText: ٱلَّذِينَ يَجْتَنِبُونَ كَبَـٰٓئِرَ ٱلْإِثْمِ وَٱلْفَوَٰحِشَ إِلَّا ٱللَّمَمَ ۚ إِنَّ رَبَّكَ وَٰسِعُ ٱلْمَغْفِرَةِ ۚ هُوَ أَعْلَمُ بِكُمْ إِذْ أَنشَأَكُم مِّنَ ٱلْأَرْضِ وَإِذْ أَنتُمْ أَجِنَّةٌۭ فِى بُطُونِ أُمَّهَـٰتِكُمْ ۖ فَلَا تُزَكُّوٓا۟ أَنفُسَكُمْ ۖ هُوَ أَعْلَمُ بِمَنِ ٱتَّقَىٰٓ
englishTranslationText:
Those	who	avoid	the	cardinal	sins	and	
lewdness,	except	that	they	approached	it	
and	refrained;	indeed	your	Lord’s	mercy	
is	limitless;	He	knows	you	very	well	–	
since	He	has	created	you	from	clay,	and	
when	you	were	foetuses	in	your	mothers’	
wombs;	therefore	do	not,	on	your	own,	
claim	yourselves	to	be	clean;	He	well	
knows	who	are	the	pious.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Woh	jo	bade	gunahoñ		aur	be-hayaiyoñ	se	
bachte	haiñ	magar	itna	ke	gunah	ke	pās	
gaye	aur	ruk	gaye	be-shak	tumhāre	Rab	ki	
maghfirat	wasee'	hai	woh	tumheiñ		khoob	
jānta	hai	tumheiñ		mitti	se	paida	kiya	aur	
jab	tum	apni	mā'oñ	ke	pet	meiñ	hamal	
they	to	āap		apni	jānoñ		ko	suthra	na	batāo	
woh	khoob	jānta	hai	jo	parhez-gār	haiñ

englishTranslationText: So	did	you	observe	him	who	turned	away?
romanUrduTranslationText: To	kya	tum	ne	dekha	jo	phir	gaya

englishTranslationText: And	he	gave	a	little,	then	refrained?
romanUrduTranslationText: Aur	kuchh	thoda	sa	diya	aur	rok	rakha

englishTranslationText: Does	he	have	knowledge	of	the	hidden,	so	he	can	foresee?
romanUrduTranslationText:
Kya	uske	pās	ghaib	ka	ilm	hai	to	woh	dekh	
raha	hai

arabicText: أَمْ لَمْ يُنَبَّأْ بِمَا فِى صُحُفِ مُوسَىٰ
englishTranslationText: Did	not	the	news	reach	him,	of	that	which	is	mentioned	in	the	Books	of	Moosa?
romanUrduTranslationText: Kya	usey	uski	khabar	na	āayi	jo	saheefoñ	meiñ	hai	Mūsā	ke

englishTranslationText: And	of	Ibrahim,	who	was	most	obedient?
romanUrduTranslationText: Aur	Ibraheem	ke	jo	ahkām	poore	bajā	lāya

englishTranslationText: That	no	burdened	soul	bears	another	soul’s	burden?
romanUrduTranslationText: Ke	koi	bojh	uthāne	wāli	jān	doosri	ka	bojh	nahi	uthāti

arabicText: وَأَن لَّيْسَ لِلْإِنسَـٰنِ إِلَّا مَا سَعَىٰ
englishTranslationText: And	that	man	will	not	obtain	anything	except	what	he	strove	for?
romanUrduTranslationText: Aur	yeh	ke	āadmi	na	pāayega	magar	apni	koshish

englishTranslationText: And	that	his	effort	will	soon	be	scrutinised?
romanUrduTranslationText: Aur	yeh	ke	uski	koshish	‘an-qareeb	dekhi	jāyegi

englishTranslationText: Then	he	will	be	fully	repaid	for	it?
romanUrduTranslationText: Phir	uska	bharpoor	badla	diya	jāyega.

englishTranslationText: And	that	the	end	is	only	towards	your	Lord?
romanUrduTranslationText: Aur	yeh	ke	be-shak		tumhāre	Rab	hi	ki	taraf	inteha	hai

englishTranslationText: And	that	it	is	He	Who	made	(you)	laugh	and	made	(you)	cry?
romanUrduTranslationText: Aur	yeh	ke	wohi	hai	jisne	hañsāya	aur	rulāya

englishTranslationText: And	that	it	is	He	Who	gave	death	and	gave	life?
romanUrduTranslationText: Aur	yeh	ke	wohi	hai	jisne	māra	aur	jilāya

englishTranslationText:
And	that	it	is	He	Who	has	created	the	
pairs,	male	and	female?
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	yeh	ke	us	ne	do	jode	banaye	nar	aur	
māda

englishTranslationText: From	a	drop	of	liquid,	when	it	is	added?
romanUrduTranslationText: Nutfe	se	jab	dāla	jāye

englishTranslationText:
And	that	only	upon	Him	is	the	next	
revival?
romanUrduTranslationText: Aur	yeh	ke	usi	ke	zimme	hai	pichla	uthāna

englishTranslationText:
And	that	it	is	He	Who	has	given	wealth	
and	contentment?
romanUrduTranslationText: Aur	yeh	ke	usi	ne	ghinā	di	aur	qanā'at	di.

englishTranslationText:
And	that	He	only	is	the	Lord	of	the	star	
Sirius?
romanUrduTranslationText: Aur	yeh	ke	wohi	sitāra	Shi’ra	ka	Rab	hai

englishTranslationText:
And	that	it	is	He	Who	earlier	destroyed	
the	tribe	of	Aad?
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	yeh	ke	usi	ne	pehli	Āad	ko	halāk	
farmāya

englishTranslationText:
And	destroyed	the	tribe	of	Thamud,	not	
sparing	anyone?
romanUrduTranslationText: Aur	Samood	ko	to	koi	bāqi	na	chorda

arabicText: وَقَوْمَ نُوحٍۢ مِّن قَبْلُ ۖ إِنَّهُمْ كَانُوا۟ هُمْ أَظْلَمَ وَأَطْغَىٰ
englishTranslationText:
And	before	them,	the	people	of	Nooh?	
Indeed	they	were	more	unjust	and	more	
rebellious	than	these!
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	un	se	pehle	Nūh	ki	qaum	ko	be-shak		
woh	un	se	bhi	zālim	aur	sarkash	they

englishTranslationText:
And	that	it	is	He	Who	threw	down	the	
upturned	townships?
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	usne	ulatne	wāli	basti	ko	neeche	
girāya

englishTranslationText:
So	they	were	covered	with	whatever	
covered	them?
romanUrduTranslationText: To	us	par	chhaya	jo	kuch	chaya

englishTranslationText:
So	O	listener!	Which	favour	of	your	Lord	
will	you	doubt?
romanUrduTranslationText:
To	aey	sunne	wāle!	Apne	Rab	ki	kaun	si	
ne'matoñ	meiñ	shak	karega	.

englishTranslationText:
He	(Prophet Muhammad – peace and 
blessings be upon him)	is	a	Herald	of	
Warning,	like	the	former	Heralds	of	
Warning.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Yeh	ek	dar	sunāne	wāle	haiñ	agle	darāne	
waloñ		ki	tarah

englishTranslationText: The	approaching	event	has	come	near.
romanUrduTranslationText: Pās	āayi	pās	āne	wāli

arabicText: لَيْسَ لَهَا مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ كَاشِفَةٌ
englishTranslationText: None	except	Allah	can	avert	it.
romanUrduTranslationText: Allah	ke	siwa	uska	koi	kholne	wāla	nahi

englishTranslationText: So	are	you	surprised	at	this	fact?
romanUrduTranslationText: To	kya	is	bāt	se	tum	t’ajjub	karte	ho

englishTranslationText: And	you	laugh,	and	do	not	weep!
romanUrduTranslationText: Aur	hanste	ho	aur	rote	nahi.

englishTranslationText: And	you	are	lost	in	play!
romanUrduTranslationText: Aur	tum	khel	meiñ	pade	ho.

englishTranslationText: Therefore	prostrate	for	Allah,	and	worship	Him.	(Command	of	Prostration	#	12)
romanUrduTranslationText:
To	Allah	ke	liye	sajda	aur	uski	bandagi	
karo.	(Sajde	ka	hukm	#	12)

englishTranslationText: The	Last	Day	came	near,	and	the	moon	split	apart.
romanUrduTranslationText: Pās	āayi	Qiyamat	aur	shaq	ho	gaya	chānd

arabicText: وَإِن يَرَوْا۟ ءَايَةًۭ يُعْرِضُوا۟ وَيَقُولُوا۟ سِحْرٌۭ مُّسْتَمِرٌّۭ
englishTranslationText: And	when	they	see	a	sign,	they	turn	away	and	say,	“Just	a	customary	magic!”
romanUrduTranslationText: Aur	agar	dekheiñ	koi	nishāni	to	muñh	pherte	aur	kehte	haiñ	yeh	to	jādu	hai	chala	āta

arabicText: وَكَذَّبُوا۟ وَٱتَّبَعُوٓا۟ أَهْوَآءَهُمْ ۚ وَكُلُّ أَمْرٍۢ مُّسْتَقِرٌّۭ
englishTranslationText: And	they	denied	and	followed	their	own	desires,	whereas	each	matter	has	been	decided!
romanUrduTranslationText: Aur	unhoñ	ne	jhutlāya	aur	apni	khwahishoñ	ke	peeche	huwe	aur	har	kām	qarār	pa	chuka	hai

arabicText: وَلَقَدْ جَآءَهُم مِّنَ ٱلْأَنۢبَآءِ مَا فِيهِ مُزْدَجَرٌ
englishTranslationText: And	indeed	the	news	which	had	a	lot	of	deterrence,	came	to	them.
romanUrduTranslationText: Aur	be-shak	unke	pās	woh	khabreiñ	āyiñ	jin	meiñ	kāfi	rok	thi

englishTranslationText: The	pinnacle	of	wisdom	–	so	how	will	the	Heralds	of	warning	provide	any	benefit?
romanUrduTranslationText: Inteha	ko	pahuñchi	huyi	hikmat	phir	kya	kām	deiñ	dar	sunāne	wāle.

arabicText: فَتَوَلَّ عَنْهُمْ ۘ يَوْمَ يَدْعُ ٱلدَّاعِ إِلَىٰ شَىْءٍۢ نُّكُرٍ
englishTranslationText:
Therefore	turn	away	from	them;	on	the	day	when	the	announcer	will	call	towards	a	severe	
unknown	matter	–
romanUrduTranslationText: To	tum	un	se	muñh	pher	lo	jis	din	bulāne	wāla	ek	sakht	be	pehchāni	bāt	ki	taraf	bulayega

arabicText: خُشَّعًا أَبْصَـٰرُهُمْ يَخْرُجُونَ مِنَ ٱلْأَجْدَاثِ كَأَنَّهُمْ جَرَادٌۭ مُّنتَشِرٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
They	will	come	out	from	the	graves	with	
eyes	lowered,	as	if	they	were	spread	locusts.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Neechi	āñkheiñ	kiye	huwe	qabroñ	se	nikleñ	
ge	goya	woh	tedi	(Tiddi)	haiñ	phaili	huyi

arabicText: مُّهْطِعِينَ إِلَى ٱلدَّاعِ ۖ يَقُولُ ٱلْكَـٰفِرُونَ هَـٰذَا يَوْمٌ عَسِرٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
Rushing	towards	the	caller;	the	
disbelievers	will	say,	“This	is	a	tough	day.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Bulāne	wāle	ki	taraf	lapakte	huwe	kāfir	
kaheñ	ge	yeh	din	sakht	hai.

arabicText: ۞ كَذَّبَتْ قَبْلَهُمْ قَوْمُ نُوحٍۢ فَكَذَّبُوا۟ عَبْدَنَا وَقَالُوا۟ مَجْنُونٌۭ وَٱزْدُجِرَ
englishTranslationText:
Before	these,	the	people	of	Nooh	denied	
and	they	belied	Our	bondman	and	said,	
“He	is	a	madman”	and	rebuffed	him.
romanUrduTranslationText:
In	se	pehle	Nūh	ki	qaum	ne	jhutlāya	to	
hamāre	bande	ko	jhoota	bataya	aur	bole	
woh	majnoon	hai	aur	usey	jhidka

englishTranslationText:
He	therefore	prayed	to	his	Lord,	“I	am	
overpowered,	therefore	avenge	me.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
To	us	ne	apne	Rab	se	du’a	ki	ke	maiñ	
maghloob	huñ	tu	mera	badla	le	.
